item.description:
Patricia is returning! This time we will learn how to make "boo boo" bags to help with those little hurts that we and the children often incur!

As always, bring a dish that can feed at least four people, and be ready for great conversation, good food and a terrific time.

This particular Meetup/potluck is the kick-off for a series of sessions that Patricia will be hosting for a separate fee on plants and medicine. You would be amazed how many plants you may consider "weeds" are actually very beneficial in helping with pulled muscles, coughs and other minor physical ailments! None of this information, of course, is considered a substitute for seeking professional medical help!

We will let you know the schedule for Patricia's sessions right after this Meetup!

Remember, more people than those here on this Meetup board attend, so do not be deceived by the numbers of RSVP's!

Looking forward to seeing you soon!!
item.name: Making "boo boo" Bags!
